page.title: 04GOOD COMPANIONS CLUB
page.content: Members live in Chevington or Chedburgh and are 60 years of age or more. Meetings are held every Tuesday (other than last Tuesday in the month) in Chevington Village Hall from 2.30 to 4.30 pm. Membership is restricted to 60 at the present there is 17 vacancies. Members play Whist, Cribbage, Dominoes Scrabble and Bingo. Outings are arranged in the summer, also visits to the Theatre, at least one Fete and Bazaar is held each year to raise funds At the A.G.M. held 2nd April, 1985 the following Committee was voted for: President - Mrs. Avis Chairman - Mrs. Stutely Vice Chairman- Mr. Beale Secretary - Mrs. Corby Treasurer - Mr. Munday Mr. & Mrs. Doe, Mrs. Munday Mrs. Mackay and Mr. Stutely It was agreed that the teas would be
